channel.title: The Vanilla Bacon Affinity
channel.description:
Vanilla Bacon is an over 18 Vanilla-esque server with Bukkit Mods installed for to connect parallel realms that may be discovered throughout the land. We are a lively group consisting mostly of users from The Land of Karma server that is now offline. We are respectful group that loves to have fun, build cool shit and go on amazing adventures. The map is relatively new, apply for whitelisting on our website!
We are looking for builders, designers, city planners, event coordinators and more! See website link or go to: vanillabacon.wordpress.com to apply to join!
**We are currently testing Bukkit 1.2 beta plugins and seem to be working smoothly. Future updates will be implemented as stable versions are released.**
PLUGINS INSTALLED: See Website: http://vanillabacon.wordpress.com

item.title: The Vanilla Bacon Affinity
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie

Vanilla flavored bacon? O.O
